tool.name: Variant Effect Predictor (VEP)
tool.command: ln -s -f $stats_output out_stats.html && /usr/bin/perl /Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tools/testtoolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/willmclaren/ensembl_vep/d6778b5d8382/ensembl_vep/variant_effect_predictor/variant_effect_predictor.pl -species $species -format vcf -quiet -force -fork 4 -port 3337 -cache -dir /Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tool_deps/vep/84/willmclaren/package_vep_84/d6778b5d8382/caches -offline -i $input -o $output -stats_file out_stats.html $output_format $everything $check_existing $check_ref $regulatory $symbol $hgvs -terms $terms $sift $polyphen $transcript_set $plugin_lof $pick $flag_pick $flag_pick_allele #if str( $cadd_cond.use_cadd ) == "True": #if str ( $cadd_cond.plugin_type ) == "full_ref_files": -plugin CADD,/Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tool_deps/vep/84/willmclaren/package_vep_84/d6778b5d8382/caches/Plugins/CADD/CADD_v1.3/annotations/allSnpsAnd20Mindels/whole_genome_SNVs.tsv.gz,/Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tool_deps/vep/84/willmclaren/package_vep_84/d6778b5d8382/caches/Plugins/CADD/CADD_v1.3/annotations/allSnpsAnd20Mindels/InDels.tsv.gz #else -plugin CADD,/Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tool_deps/vep/84/willmclaren/package_vep_84/d6778b5d8382/caches/Plugins/CADD/CADD_v1.3/annotations/CADD-MORL-ROI-FOR-VEP/GrCH37.CADD-v1.3.otoscopev6v7.tsv.gz,/Shared/Clngx/clngx-2-dev/tools/shed_tool_deps/vep/84/willmclaren/package_vep_84/d6778b5d8382/caches/Plugins/CADD/CADD_v1.3/annotations/CADD-MORL-ROI-FOR-VEP/GrCH37.CADD-InDels-v1.3.otoscopev6v7.tsv.gz #end if #end if #if str( $pick_order ) != "": -pick_order "${pick_order}" #end if

param.name: terms
param.label: Consequence types
param.help: --terms. The type of consequence terms to output.

param.name: plugin_lof
param.label: Plugin: LOFTEE (Loss-Of-Function Transcript Effect Estimator)
param.help: --plugin LoF. Identifies loss-of-function variation. Assesses stop-gained, splice site disrupting, and frameshift variants.

param.name: use_cadd
param.label: Plugin: CADD (Combined Annotation Dependent Depletion)
param.help: --plugin CADD. Scores deleteriousness of SNVs and indels.

param.name: sift
param.label: SIFT predictions
param.help: --sift. Predicts whether an amino acid substitution affects protein function.

param.name: polyphen
param.label: PolyPhen predictions
param.help: --polyphen. Predicts the impact of an amino acid substitution on the structure and function of a human protein.

param.name: check_existing
param.label: Check for existing co-located variations
param.help: --check_existing. Checks for the existence of known variants that are co-located with your input.

param.name: check_ref
param.label: Sanity check supplied reference allele against Ensembl reference
param.help: --check_ref. Warning: Silently skips lines that do not match reference. Do not use with hg19 input.

param.name: regulatory
param.label: Get regulatory consequences
param.help: --regulatory. Looks for overlaps with regulatory regions.

param.name: symbol
param.label: Add gene symbol (e.g. HGNC) (where available) to output

param.name: pick
param.label: Pick one consequence
param.help: --pick. Exclude all but one consequence per variant. Specify criteria for picking consequence ("Pick order") below.

param.name: flag_pick
param.label: Add PICK flag to one consequence
param.help: --flag_pick. Same as --pick, except just adds PICK flag to the chosen consequence and doesn't delete the other consequences.

param.name: flag_pick_allele
param.label: Add PICK flag to one consequence per allele
param.help: --flag_pick_allele. Same as --flag_pick, except chooses a consequence for each allele.

param.name: pick_order
param.label: Pick order
param.help: --pick_order. Comma-separated order of criteria to use when choosing a consequence with --pick, --flag_pick, etc. Default order: canonical,appris,tsl,biotype,ccds,rank,length

tool.help: This tool calculates consequences of variants using Ensembl annotations. See http://www.ensembl.org/info/docs/tools/vep/script/vep_options.html for more information on options.
